ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: Whereas I don t personally find Wizards to be at all interesting the people I know who play them feel they totally rock.  What exactly do you feel needs to be
ygData.messageBody:
Whereas I don't personally find Wizards to be at all interesting the
people I know who play them feel they totally rock. What exactly do
you feel needs to be done to the Wizard class to improve it?? They are
an indispensable part of a group as they are the masters at laying down
damage. With the exception of maybe Rogues (and only because most of
their abilities are not functioning) I don't think there is any problem
with any of the classes and I have played most of them to reasonable
levels (mid teens). Each class is designed to complement the other and
make a positive contribution to the group, no one class is designed to
be all powerful or all things. Remember this game is ENTIRELY based
upon the concept of being in a group, if you want to solo you can but
obviously the game mechanics are not going to be friendly to it as the
game was not designed to be played solo.


-----Original Message-----
From: wizard
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 11:26 AM
To: .EQ.Magic
Cc: wizard
Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Wizards

From: Wizard <wizard@...>

Very big problem is that verant dont have a time to balance classes and
races and whole game to be exact for high lv thet mean after lv 29 -30.
In
beta there vere not enough people at high lv to make a exact balancing
and
until one month ago some high lv dungeons in game where with monsters
without loot you can see that a lady vox a mighty dragon is even now
tuned
in. So after lv 20 wizards were untuned, what you can se with problems
with
lv 20 spells.
Many players in beta jumper right from lv 10 15 to lv 40 to be able to
test
high lv but they nevarly never arived normaly at lv 50. only 2 guys
using
some not so legal techicues made it very fast to get at high lv. so
normal
balancing of high lv classes was never made and we see it proces now in
last patchs. Wizards have a right to have its share of funn in game if
they
are weak at start they have right to be relatyve strong at end of game.
They are now not masters of DD spels as max lv spell is not in game,
hiden
spells are to god hiden and they also are not masters of transport and
they
have very anoying time needing to meditate much more of other classes
and
are much easier to die depending of power of their spells, and low
defences. They are better balanced that some other classes, and are not
weakest class in game but they need some retouch and im sure many other
classes need retouch in need to follow idea what verant put in front of
class its group roles and overall game play and time needed to get to
max
power lv it is valid for all classes.





At 16.11 07/07/99 -0400, you wrote:
>I think the whole point is the game is oriented and balanced towards
>groups. Trying to hold up the pluses and minuses of an individual
>class is pointless as they are each designed to be compensated by
>another. Pennaggolan has it right and we need to view the
complementary
>benefits of each class in determining its abilities.
>
>Plus after 20 Wizards don't need to ride that damn boat and that alone
>makes them worthwhile.
>
>Merauk
>21 Enchanter
>Cazic-Thule
>
